title: Discussing ROI of Studying Abroad with Prodigy Finance
description: In this episode of the International Student Podcast by Prodigy Finance, I share my journey from India to Arizona State University, discussing the financial and career ROI of US education for international students. Topics include the advantages of STEM degrees, budgeting strategies, networking importance, building a personal brand in the global job market, and how my education led to becoming a founding engineer at a startup. The conversation with Cyndi Satram explores both tangible financial returns and the invaluable personal growth that makes international education a worthwhile investment.

title: Tour of ASU with YouTuber Yudi J
description: A comprehensive campus tour with Yudi (Pritesh Jagani), discussing graduate education at ASU, including my experience as a Teaching Assistant, the benefits of tuition waivers, and insights into campus life and higher education trends.

title: My Opinion on ASU's stance on the war in Ukraine for The State Press
description: An opinion piece discussing how the war in Ukraine impacted Ukrainian students and faculty at ASU, highlighting the need for enhanced academic flexibility and financial support despite existing university initiatives.

title: FIFA World Cup, ESL and more with Adrian from Rabona TV
description: A detailed discussion with Adrian from Rabona TV about the 2022 FIFA World Cup, European Super League, and the future of football, exploring both sporting and technological aspects.
